articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Turkish police detain four pilots over Ghosn's escape -NTV
articles.description: Turkish police have detained seven people, including four pilots, over the transit of ousted Nissan boss Carlos Ghosn through Turkey after fleeing Japan on his way to Lebanon, broadcaster NTV said on Thursday.'
articles.content:
ISTANBUL, Jan 2 (Reuters) - Turkish police have detained seven people, including four pilots, over the transit of ousted Nissan boss Carlos Ghosn through Turkey after fleeing Japan on his way to Lebanon, broadcaster NTV said on Thursday.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: German factory activity shrinks again in December: PMI
articles.description: Germany's export-dependent manufacturing sector contracted further in December as the rate of decline in production accelerated for the first time in three months, but output expectations rose slightly, a survey showed on Thursday.'
articles.content:
BERLIN (Reuters) - Germany’s export-dependent manufacturing sector contracted further in December as the rate of decline in production accelerated for the first time in three months, but output expectations rose slightly, a survey showed on Thursday.

articles.author: Michael Church
articles.title: Li Tie replaces Lippi as China head coach
articles.description: Former Everton midfielder Li Tie is the new head coach of China's national team, the country's football association announced on Thursday.
articles.content:
HONG KONG (Reuters) - Former Everton midfielder Li Tie is the new head coach of China’s national team, the country’s football association announced on Thursday. 
Li takes over as the long-term replacement for Marcello Lippi, who quit following a surprise los… [+1461 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Austrian sensor maker AMS secures 59.9% Osram stake
articles.description: Austrian sensor maker AMS on Thursday said it had secured a 59.9% stake in German lighting group Osram , reaching a 55% minimum threshold but falling short of a 75% hurdle needed to tap Osram's profits.
articles.content:
MUNICH (Reuters) - Austrian sensor maker AMS (AMS.S) on Thursday said it had secured a 59.9% stake in German lighting group Osram (OSRn.DE), reaching a 55% minimum threshold but falling short of a 75% hurdle needed to tap Osram’s profits.

articles.title: Russian oil, condensate output surges to record-high in 2019
articles.description: Russian oil and gas condensate production hit a record-high 11.25 million barrels per day (bpd) in 2019, beating the previous record of 11.16 million bpd set a year earlier, Energy Ministry data showed on Thursday.
articles.content:
MOSCOW (Reuters) - Russian oil and gas condensate production hit a record-high 11.25 million barrels per day (bpd) in 2019, beating the previous record of 11.16 million bpd set a year earlier, Energy Ministry data showed on Thursday.
